subtitle.line1: Internxt Drive is a zero-knowledge cloud storage
subtitle.line2: service based on best-in-class privacy and security

subtitle.line1: Our products are based on your privacy and security. Drive and Photos are just
subtitle.line2: the beginning of a full family of products focused on you and your privacy.

feature1.description: Your files are encrypted before leaving your device, so only you can access your files, no tricks, no hidden things, just privacy, that’s Internxt.

feature2.description: Access the whole family of apps adapted for all your devices to suit all your needs.

feature3.description: Unlike other competitors, our business model is not based on ads, but on you. We don’t access or sell your data.

subtitle.line1: Brands and investors trust us so strongly that
subtitle.line2: we raised more than 1M in 2 years.

subtitle.line1: Our clients are very happy with Internxt Drive, but
subtitle.line2: they are happier knowing they are in total privacy.
